description: Fill up all your gas tanks
Move propane BBQ appliances away from structures
Switch off electrical and gas appliances
Fill water buckets and place them around the house
Seal attic and ground vents with pre-cut plywood or commercial seals
Get away from windows and get underground
Make sure that each family member has identity card
Drop to the ground; take cover under a stable table or any other furniture
Turn refrigerators & freezers to coldest setting
Listen to your radio for information and advice
Winterize your car with antifreeze, snow chains, jumper cables
